meanings.definition: Not capable of being shaped or molded.
meanings.sent1: The nonmalleable metal could not be bent or twisted.
meanings.sent2: The clay became nonmalleable after it dried in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The nonmalleable cookie dough refused to take the shape of the cookie cutter.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmalleable opinions on the topic remained steadfast despite the arguments.
meanings.sent5: The nonmalleable rock stood strong against the forces of erosion.

meanings.sent1: His nonmalleable attitude made it difficult to convince him to try new things.
meanings.sent2: The nonmalleable rules of the game were set in stone and could not be altered.
meanings.sent3: The nonmalleable cat refused to move from its favorite spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmalleable determination to succeed drove her to overcome all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The nonmalleable bond between the siblings could not be broken by any disagreement.
